verses.roman:
āra kṛṣṇa-nāma laite kṛṣṇa-sthāne sthiti-
mahā-pātakera haya ei prāyaścitti

synonyms: āra—further; kṛṣṇa-nāma—the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra; laite—continuously chanting; kṛṣṇa-sthāne sthiti—being situated in company with Lord Kṛṣṇa; mahā-pātakera—of all kinds of sinful activity; haya—is; ei—this; prāyaścitti—atonement.
translation: "When you are situated at the lotus feet of Kṛṣṇa, no sinful reaction can touch you. This is the best solution to all sinful activity."
